<title level="1" right="Trait">[Wayang](/Traits.aspx?ID=370)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 310</row>

Small humanoids who emigrated from the Shadow Plane long ago, wayangs still wield shadow magic.
